description: This Dart source file defines the RoomsService class which provides methods to fetch room data from an API, including handling errors. It imports external packages like dio for HTTP requests and models for Room data representation.

classes.name: RoomsService
classes.description: Service class responsible for fetching available rooms and room details from the API.

methods.name: getRooms
methods.description: Fetches a list of available rooms asynchronously.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles DioException errors, extracting meaningful error messages from API responses or network errors.
